text: Diego Pérez Villamuriel (died 1520) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Mondoñedo (1512–1520)."Bishop Diego Pérez Villamuriel" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved September 5, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo-Ferrol" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016"Diocese of Mondoñedo–Ferrol" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016 Villamuriel was born in Spain. On 1 October 1512, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Julius II as Bishop of Mondoñedo. He served as Bishop of Mondoñedo until his death in 1520. == References == Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Julius II Category:1520 deaths
title: Diego Pérez Villamuriel
